Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with wide mouth, rounded rim, more or less straight walls and stable base with flat bottom. Orangey-coloured paste. Interior and exterior surfaces with white-coloured coating. In the interior we find a painted decoration in red: schematic floral motifs, arranged radially, demarcated by a double line below the rim.
